operations.notes: Used to turn on recording for some or all cameras.  Recording duration defaults to 10 minutes but can be set via optional parameter

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: A list of camera ids.  If this parameter is omitted, all cameras with write access available to the requesting user be be used.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Either the keyword, ‘now’, or the time at which the recording should begin.  The format for the time is 'YYYYMMDDHHMMSS.NNN'. If this parameter is omitted, ‘now’ is used.

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: Duration of the recording in seconds.  If omitted, the value 600 (10 minutes) will be used.

responseMessages.message: Unexpected or non-identifiable arguments are supplied
Unauthorized due to invalid session cookie
Forbidden due to the user missing the necessary privileges

operations.notes: Used to turn on all cameras in the caller user’s account. Caller must be an account_superuser.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Either the keyword, ‘now’, or the time at which the motion based recording and previews  should begin.  The format for the time is 'YYYYMMDDHHMMSS.NNN'. If this parameter is omitted, ‘now’ is used. THIS ARGUMENT IS IGNORED FOR NOW.

responseMessages.message: Unexpected or non-identifiable arguments are supplied
Unauthorized due to invalid session cookie
Forbidden due to the user missing the necessary privileges

operations.notes: Used to turn off all cameras in the caller user’s account. Caller must be an account_superuser.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Either the keyword, ‘now’, or the time at which the motion based recording and previews  should begin.  The format for the time is 'YYYYMMDDHHMMSS.NNN'. If this parameter is omitted, ‘now’ is used. THIS ARGUMENT IS IGNORED FOR NOW.

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: Duration of the recording in seconds.  If omitted, the value 600 (10 minutes) will be used. THIS ARGUMENT IS IGNORED FOR NOW.

responseMessages.message: Unexpected or non-identifiable arguments are supplied
Unauthorized due to invalid session cookie
Forbidden due to the user missing the necessary privileges
